job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: looking for motivated frontendmobilefullstack engineers ready to take on the challenge of working for a fastpaced start up we have a very up to date stack that will provide you with experience in a distributed microservice architecture that leverages many top current technologies we are looking for someone who is a big team player and likes to engage in building solutions from beginning to end with the team ltbrgtltbrgtrequired experienceltbrgt experience with modern js frameworks react angular vue or flutterltbrgtgraphqlltbrgt years of experience building modern webmobile applicationsltbrgt unit testing ee testingltbrgt event driven architectures microservice architectureltbrgtltbrgtbonus experienceltbrgt kubernetes dockerltbrgt awsltbrgt cltbrgt kafka confluent
